Posts.EditableText: We (north of house) released Elba on iOS. Elba is a text based, episodical, narrative experience. Together with an old friend you uncover the mysteries of an abandoned island. We appreciate any kind of feedback. Most important, Enjoy :-)
Posts.HTML:
We (north of house)
released Elba on iOS.

Elba is a text based, episodical, narrative experience.
Together with an old friend you uncover the mysteries of an abandoned island.

We appreciate any kind of feedback.

Most important,
Enjoy :-)
